description:
Show a persistent breadcrumb trail with the last 5-10 entities viewed, allowing quick navigation back to recently accessed records without losing context or using browser back button.

**Rationale:** Users frequently jump between related entities and lose their place. Browser back button may not preserve filters or scroll position. Losing context disrupts workflow and forces repetitive navigation.
title: Breadcrumb Trail with Recent Entity History
